definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
Dagger Society, anti-Qing secret society who mounted an unsuccessful rebellion in 1855

sentences.english: Well, I guess I just didn't realize just how sharp this exacto knife was.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我承認我沒有想到這個小刀能有這麼鋒利。

sentences.english: You are welcome to the loan of my knife.
sentences.chinese: 你可隨意借用我的小刀。

sentences.english: The boat knifed through the waves.
My daughter points a pencil with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 我女兒用小刀削尖鉛筆。

sentences.english: After the fall of Small Swords Society Uprising, opinions vary on the whereabouts of Liu Lichuan.
sentences.chinese: 小刀會起義失敗後，劉麗川的下落歷來衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: This type of ball pen is used as a knife for cutting paper by teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 這款圓珠筆被青少年當作小刀用來裁紙。

sentences.english: He cut his name into the bark with his knife.
sentences.chinese: 他用小刀把自己的名字刻在樹皮上。

sentences.english: Teri takes Eli’s knife and Kim covers up the blood on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞拿着伊菜的小刀，金姆將地上的血跡掩蓋住。

sentences.english: It may hurt a little because I'll have to use my knife.
sentences.chinese: 我得用小刀，可能會有點痛。

sentences.english: Who knows the exit in later 5566 nickname knife?
sentences.chinese: 誰知道5566裏後來退出的那個外號小刀的？

sentences.english: The police found a knife together with the stolen money, hidden in a hollow tree.
sentences.chinese: 警察在一個樹洞裏找到了藏匿的小刀，還有贓款。

sentences.english: My brother bought me a pocket knife yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我的弟弟昨天給了我一把小刀。

sentences.english: Use a sharp knife to cut onions and thyme in a French Chicken recipe.
sentences.chinese: 用鋒利的小刀在法國洋蔥，百里香雞食譜。

sentences.english: This is the knife by which I peel apples.
sentences.chinese: 這是我削蘋果用的小刀。

sentences.english: If we use it properly, it can pare apples.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們能恰當地使用小刀，那它能削去蘋果皮。

definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
